help-file.title: ELAPHIDIST
help-file.content:
A follower of this path of training focuses on emulating the movement of the snake in attempt to enhance speed, mental focus and precision. They will strike at neural knots crippling their opponents or lash out in a flurry of blows. Their extreme control will also enable them to avoid larger magical attacks by twisting out of the way.
Innates --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Level 46: Evasion Level 51: Enhanced pressure points
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Level 31: Flurry of blows Level 36: Enhanced heroism
